name: Ricetta: gamberetti cristallini
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Crystal Shrimp.

value.name: Riso
value.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Carota
value.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

value.name: Gamberetti cristallini
value.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.

value.name: Xingqiu
value.desc: Un ragazzo con una grande passione per i libri che brandisce una lunga spada. Vanta un cuore cavalleresco e una smania per la giustizia e la lealt√†.

value.name: Ravioli squisiti
value.desc: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
